posts.post_content:
I have 2 nice 1911 Obaks available for trade.

I'm looking for 1912 Zeenut catchers, 1912 HRK catchers, and 1911 Obak catcher pose cards.

Here's the link to my website, so you can see which ones I have already.

[url]http://home.myfairpoint.net/vintagecatcher/thevintagecatcher/index.html[/url]

Thanks,

Patrick
